mapper.insert:
insert all into board(BIDX,TITLE,USERID,WRITEDATE,thumbnail,CONTENTS,CATEGORY) VALUES(createbidx.nextval,#{title},#{userid},sysdate,#{thumbnail},#{contents},#{category})
into boardtag(bidx,tag) values(createbidx.nextval,#{tagitem.tag})
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: select count(*) from scrape where bidx=#{bidx} and userid=#{userid}
select count(*) from goodbad where bidx=#{bidx} and userid = #{userid}

select b.bidx,b.hitcount as hitcnt,b.thumbnail,SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(b.contents, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;', ''),1,25) as contents,b.title,b.userid,b.writedate,b.category,nvl(gb.gcnt,0) AS gcnt,nvl(gb.bcnt,0) as bcnt,nvl(s.scrapecnt,0) AS scrapecnt,nvl(rp.rpcnt,0) as rpcnt from ( select distinct bidx,thumbnail,HITCOUNT,contents,TITLE,USERID,WRITEDATE,CATEGORY from board ) b left join ( select bidx, count(decode(g_b_count,'0','1')) as gcnt,count(decode(g_b_count,'1','1')) as bcnt from goodbad group by bidx ) gb ON b.bidx = gb.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as scrapecnt from scrape group by bidx ) s ON b.bidx = s.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as rpcnt from BoardReply group by bidx) rp on b.bidx = rp.bidx order by b.writedate desc

select b.bidx,b.hitcount as hitcnt,b.thumbnail,SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(b.contents, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;', ''),1,25) as contents,b.title,b.userid,b.writedate,b.category,nvl(gb.gcnt,0) AS gcnt,nvl(gb.bcnt,0) as bcnt,nvl(s.scrapecnt,0) AS scrapecnt,nvl(rp.rpcnt,0) as rpcnt from ( select distinct bidx,HITCOUNT,thumbnail,contents,TITLE,USERID,WRITEDATE,CATEGORY from board ) b left join ( select bidx, count(decode(g_b_count,'0','1')) as gcnt,count(decode(g_b_count,'1','1')) as bcnt from goodbad group by bidx ) gb ON b.bidx = gb.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as scrapecnt from scrape group by bidx ) s ON b.bidx = s.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as rpcnt from BoardReply group by bidx) rp on b.bidx = rp.bidx where category =#{category} order by b.writedate desc

select b.bidx,b.hitcount as hitcnt,b.thumbnail,SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(b.contents, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;', ''),1,25) as contents,b.title,b.userid,b.writedate,b.category,nvl(gb.gcnt,0) AS gcnt,nvl(gb.bcnt,0) as bcnt,nvl(s.scrapecnt,0) AS scrapecnt,nvl(rp.rpcnt,0) as rpcnt from ( select distinct bidx,HITCOUNT,contents,thumbnail,TITLE,USERID,WRITEDATE,CATEGORY from board ) b left join ( select bidx, count(decode(g_b_count,'0','1')) as gcnt,count(decode(g_b_count,'1','1')) as bcnt from goodbad group by bidx ) gb ON b.bidx = gb.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as scrapecnt from scrape group by bidx ) s ON b.bidx = s.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as rpcnt from BoardReply group by bidx) rp on b.bidx = rp.bidx left join ( select bidx, tag from boardtag) t on b.bidx = t.bidx where tag =#{tag} order by b.writedate desc

select b.bidx,b.title,b.userid,b.writedate,b.contents,b.hitcount,b.category,t.tag,g.gooder,bad.bader,s.scraper,rp.replycount from ( select bidx,title,contents,userid,writedate,HITCOUNT,category from board where bidx=#{bidx}) b left join(select bidx,tag from boardtag where bidx=#{bidx})t on b.bidx=t.bidx left join ( select bidx, userid as gooder from goodbad where bidx=#{bidx} and g_b_count='0') g ON b.bidx = g.bidx left join ( select bidx, userid as bader from goodbad where bidx=#{bidx} and g_b_count='1') bad on b.bidx = bad.bidx left join ( select bidx, userid as scraper from scrape where bidx=#{bidx}) s ON b.bidx = s.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as replycount from BoardReply where bidx=#{bidx} GROUP BY bidx) rp on b.bidx = rp.bidx
select bidx,userid from goodbad where bidx =#{bidx} and g_b_count =0
select bidx,userid from goodbad where bidx =#{bidx} and g_b_count =1
select ridx,nvl(TARGETREPLY,0) as targetreply,contents,level,bidx,writedate,userid from BOARDREPLY where bidx = #{bidx} start with targetreply is null connect by prior ridx = TARGETREPLY

select pi.profilepicture,r.ridx,r.TARGETREPLY,lpad('â”” ',3*(level-1)) || contents as contents,r.userid,r.writedate,level,r.bidx from BOARDREPLY r left join(select userid,profilepicture from tb_user) pi on r.userid = pi.userid where bidx = #{bidx} start with targetreply is null connect by prior ridx = TARGETREPLY
select bidx,userid from scrape where bidx = #{bidx}

select b.bidx,b.hitcount as hitcnt,b.thumbnail,SUBSTR(b.contents, 1, 25) as contents,b.title,b.userid,b.writedate,b.category,nvl(gb.gcnt,0) AS gcnt,nvl(gb.bcnt,0) as bcnt,nvl(s.scrapecnt,0) AS scrapecnt,nvl(rp.rpcnt,0) as rpcnt from ( select distinct bidx,thumbnail,HITCOUNT,contents,TITLE,USERID,WRITEDATE,CATEGORY from board ) b left join ( select bidx, count(decode(g_b_count,'0','1')) as gcnt,count(decode(g_b_count,'1','1')) as bcnt from goodbad group by bidx ) gb ON b.bidx = gb.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as scrapecnt from scrape group by bidx ) s ON b.bidx = s.bidx left join ( select bidx, count(*) as rpcnt from BoardReply group by bidx) rp on b.bidx = rp.bidx where title like #{searchkeyword} or userid like #{searchkeyword} or contents like #{searchkeyword}
mapper.update: update board set hitcount = hitcount+1 where bidx =#{bidx}
mapper.select: select tag from boardtag where tag is not null group by tag order by count(tag) desc
select p.profilepicture as profilepicture from (select bidx,userid from board) b left join(select profilepicture,userid from tb_user) p ON b.userid = p.userid where bidx = #{bidx}
select G_B_count from goodbad where bidx=#{bidx} and userid =#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete goodbad where bidx=#{bidx} and userid = #{userid}
delete scrape where bidx=#{bidx} and userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update goodbad set G_B_COUNT = #{g_b_count} where bidx= #{bidx} and userid = #{userid}
